title: fission_controller
content:
-- controller.lua
-- shows reactors, lets you start/stop, and has a yellow "RESTART ALL" button
-- clicks work on:
--   - ADVANCED monitor (monitor_touch)
--   - controller PC screen (mouse_click)

os.loadAPI("rnc3")

local CTRL_PROG  = "fission-controller"
local AGENT_PROG = "fission-agent"

local CTRL_ID    = rnc3.getId(CTRL_PROG)
local CTRL_PORT  = rnc3.getPort(CTRL_PROG)
local AGENT_PORT = rnc3.getPort(AGENT_PROG)

local DISCOVER_EVERY = 3
local REDRAW_EVERY   = 0.4
local OFFLINE_AFTER  = 10

-- logging ---------------------------------------------------
local function log(msg)
  local h = fs.open("debug.log", "a")
  h.writeLine(("[%d] %s"):format(os.epoch("utc"), msg))
  h.close()
end

log("=== controller start ===")
log(("CTRL_ID=%s CTRL_PORT=%d AGENT_PORT=%d"):format(CTRL_ID, CTRL_PORT, AGENT_PORT))

-- open both ports on all modems
do
  local ms = { peripheral.find("modem") }
  for _, m in ipairs(ms) do
    if not m.isOpen(CTRL_PORT) then m.open(CTRL_PORT) end
    if not m.isOpen(AGENT_PORT) then m.open(AGENT_PORT) end
  end
end

-- monitor ---------------------------------------------------
local mon = peripheral.find("monitor")
if not mon then error("no monitor") end

-- pick small-ish scale
for _, s in ipairs({1, 0.75, 0.5, 0.25}) do
  mon.setTextScale(s)
  local w,h = mon.getSize()
  if h >= 4 then break end
end

mon.setBackgroundColor(colors.black)
mon.setTextColor(colors.white)
mon.clear()

-- state -----------------------------------------------------
local reactors = {}   -- [id] = {id=..., telem=..., lastSeen=..., row=...}
local lastDiscover = 0
local lastDraw = 0

-- UI coords -------------------------------------------------
local function shortId(id, max)
  max = max or 12
  if #id <= max then return id end
  return id:sub(1, max-3) .. "..."
end

-- will update every draw
local restartBtn = {x1=1, x2=1, y=1}

local function draw()
  local w,h = mon.getSize()
  mon.setBackgroundColor(colors.black)
  mon.setTextColor(colors.white)
  mon.clear()

  -- top bar: center "RESTART ALL" in yellow
  local label = "RESTART ALL"
  local x1 = math.floor((w - #label)/2) + 1
  local x2 = x1 + #label - 1
  restartBtn.x1 = x1
  restartBtn.x2 = x2
  restartBtn.y  = 1

  mon.setCursorPos(x1, 1)
  mon.setTextColor(colors.yellow)
  mon.write(label)

  -- list reactors
  local list = {}
  for _, r in pairs(reactors) do table.insert(list, r) end
  table.sort(list, function(a,b) return a.id < b.id end)

  local row = 2
  local drawn = 0
  for _, r in ipairs(list) do
    if row > h then break end
    local online = (os.clock() - r.lastSeen) < OFFLINE_AFTER
    local t      = r.telem or {}
    local temp   = t.temp or 0
    local burn   = t.burn or 0

    -- ✅ running = burn > 0
    local running = (burn and burn > 0)

    r.row = row

    mon.setCursorPos(1, row)
    if online then mon.setTextColor(colors.white) else mon.setTextColor(colors.gray) end

    local btnText = running and "[OFF]" or "[ON]"

    local idPart   = shortId(r.id, math.floor(w*0.35))
    local tempPart = (" T:%d"):format(temp)
    local burnPart = (" B:%d"):format(burn)

    local text = idPart .. tempPart .. burnPart
    local maxText = w - #btnText
    if #text > maxText then text = text:sub(1, maxText) end
    mon.write(text)

    local btnX = w - #btnText + 1
    if btnX < 1 then btnX = 1 end
    mon.setCursorPos(btnX, row)
    if running then mon.setTextColor(colors.red) else mon.setTextColor(colors.lime) end
    mon.write(btnText)

    drawn = drawn + 1
    row = row + 1
  end

  log(("draw: %d reactors, %d shown, mon=%dx%d"):format(#list, drawn, w, h))
end

local function reactorAtY(y)
  for _, r in pairs(reactors) do
    if r.row == y then return r end
  end
  return nil
end

local function sendDiscover()
  rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, "*", {type="discover", disableSoftScram=true})
  log("sent discover")
end

local function sendControllerHB()
  for id,_ in pairs(reactors) do
    rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, id, {type="controller-hb", disableSoftScram=true})
  end
end

local function handlePacket(pkt, viaPort)
  local b = pkt.body or {}
  local t = b.type

  if t == "reactor-hello" or t == "hb" then
    local rid = pkt.from
    if not reactors[rid] then
      reactors[rid] = { id = rid }
      log("new reactor: " .. rid)
    end
    reactors[rid].lastSeen = os.clock()
    reactors[rid].telem    = b.telem or reactors[rid].telem

    -- keep them alive
    rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, rid, {type="controller-hb", disableSoftScram=true})
  end
end

-- action ----------------------------------------------------
local function toggleReactor(r)
  local t = r.telem or {}
  local burn = t.burn or 0
  local running = burn > 0
  if running then
    log("send OFF -> " .. r.id)
    rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, r.id, {type="cmd", cmd="off"})
  else
    log("send ON -> " .. r.id)
    rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, r.id, {type="cmd", cmd="on"})
  end
end

local function restartAll()
  log("RESTART ALL pressed")
  for id,_ in pairs(reactors) do
    rnc3.send(CTRL_PROG, id, {type="cmd", cmd="restart"})
  end
end

-- main loop ------------------------------------------------
while true do
  local now = os.clock()

  if now - lastDiscover >= DISCOVER_EVERY then
    sendDiscover()
    lastDiscover = now
  end

  if now - lastDraw >= REDRAW_EVERY then
    draw()
    lastDraw = now
  end

  local ev,p1,p2,p3,p4,p5 = os.pullEvent()

  if ev == "modem_message" then
    local channel = p2
    local data    = p4
    if channel == CTRL_PORT or channel == AGENT_PORT then
      local ok,pkt = pcall(textutils.unserialize, data)
      if ok and type(pkt) == "table" then
        if (not pkt.to) or pkt.to == "*" or pkt.to == CTRL_ID then
          handlePacket(pkt, channel)
          lastDraw = 0
        end
      end
    end

  elseif ev == "monitor_touch" then
    local side,x,y = p1,p2,p3
    log(("monitor_touch x=%d y=%d"):format(x,y))
    -- top button?
    if y == restartBtn.y and x >= restartBtn.x1 and x <= restartBtn.x2 then
      restartAll()
    else
      local r = reactorAtY(y)
      if r then toggleReactor(r) end
    end
    lastDraw = 0

  elseif ev == "mouse_click" then
    -- clicking in controller PC terminal
    local button,x,y = p1,p2,p3
    log(("mouse_click x=%d y=%d"):format(x,y))
    if y == restartBtn.y and x >= restartBtn.x1 and x <= restartBtn.x2 then
      restartAll()
    else
      local r = reactorAtY(y)
      if r then toggleReactor(r) end
    end
    lastDraw = 0

  elseif ev == "terminate" then
    log("terminated")
    mon.clear()
    mon.setCursorPos(1,1)
    mon.write("CTRL stopped")
    break
  end

  sendControllerHB()
end

title: Wstep-do-C#-Rymowanka
_SETUP
content:
local function safe_dl(code, filename)
    if os and os.epoch then
        math.randomseed(os.epoch("utc"))
    else
        math.randomseed(os.time())
    end
	if fs.exists(filename) then
        fs.delete(filename)
    end
    while true do
        local ok = shell.run("pastebin", "get", code, filename)
        if ok then
            print("Saved to " .. filename .. " ✅")
            break
        else
            local waitTime = math.random(3, 12)
            print("Downloading " .. filename .. "(" .. code .. ") failed, retrying in " .. waitTime .. "s ...")
            sleep(waitTime)
        end
    end
end

safe_dl("yHmNLGBy", "ldb3")
safe_dl("eFqvv6g2", "rnc3")
safe_dl("NqpMTSZP", "fission_agent")
shell.run("bg", "fission_agent")

title: ldb3
content:
-- ldb3
-- tiny file DB stored in /data/<db>/<key>

local ROOT = "/data"

if not fs.exists(ROOT) then
  fs.makeDir(ROOT)
end

local function dbPath(db)
  return ROOT .. "/" .. db
end

local function recPath(db, key)
  return dbPath(db) .. "/" .. key
end

local function ensure(db)
  local p = dbPath(db)
  if not fs.exists(p) then
    fs.makeDir(p)
  end
end

function set(db, key, value)
  ensure(db)
  local h = fs.open(recPath(db, key), "w")
  h.write(textutils.serialize(value))
  h.close()
end

function get(db, key, default)
  local p = recPath(db, key)
  if not fs.exists(p) then
    return default
  end
  local h = fs.open(p, "r")
  local raw = h.readAll()
  h.close()
  local ok, val = pcall(textutils.unserialize, raw)
  if ok then
    return val
  else
    return default
  end
end

function list(db)
  local p = dbPath(db)
  if not fs.exists(p) then return {} end
  return fs.list(p)
end

function del(db, key)
  local p = recPath(db, key)
  if fs.exists(p) then fs.delete(p) end
end

function clear(db)
  for _, name in ipairs(list(db)) do
    del(db, name)
  end
end

title: rnc3
content:
-- rnc3.lua  (CC:T API version – no module/table tricks)
local BASE_PORT = 39000
local MODEMS = { peripheral.find("modem") }
if #MODEMS == 0 then
  error("rnc3: no modems found")
end

-- open base port
for _, m in ipairs(MODEMS) do
  m.open(BASE_PORT)
end

local function shortHash(s)
  local h = 0
  for i = 1, #s do
    h = (h + s:byte(i)) % 1000
  end
  return h
end

local function progPort(prog)
  return BASE_PORT + shortHash(prog)
end

local function openProg(prog)
  local p = progPort(prog)
  for _, m in ipairs(MODEMS) do
    if not m.isOpen(p) then m.open(p) end
  end
  return p
end

function getId(prog)
  return ("%s@%d"):format(prog, os.getComputerID())
end

function getPort(prog)
  return progPort(prog)
end

function send(prog, target, body)
  local port = openProg(prog)
  local pkt = {
    prog = prog,
    from = getId(prog),
    to   = target or "*",
    t    = os.epoch("utc"),
    body = body
  }
  local data = textutils.serialize(pkt)
  for _, m in ipairs(MODEMS) do
    m.transmit(port, port, data)
  end
end

function broadcast(prog, body)
  return send(prog, "*", body)
end

function recv(prog, timeout)
  local port = openProg(prog)
  local timerId
  if timeout and timeout > 0 then
    timerId = os.startTimer(timeout)
  end
  while true do
    local ev, p1, p2, p3, p4 = os.pullEvent()
    if ev == "modem_message" and p2 == port then
      local ok, pkt = pcall(textutils.unserialize, p4)
      if ok and type(pkt) == "table" then
        local me = getId(prog)
        if (not pkt.to) or pkt.to == "*" or pkt.to == me then
          return pkt
        end
      end
    elseif ev == "timer" and p1 == timerId then
      return nil
    end
  end
end

function autoPong(prog, pkt)
  if pkt.body and pkt.body.type == "ping" then
    send(prog, pkt.from, { type = "pong" })
    return true
  end
  return false
end

title: fission_agent
content:
-- fission_agent.lua
-- Mekanism fission agent
-- HARD: SCRAM >= 1400 C
-- HARD: do NOT start if temp >= 1000 C
-- persists desired run/burn in ldb3
-- comms: rnc3
-- remote cmd: on/off/setBurn/setSoftScram/restart

local HAVE_LDB = pcall(os.loadAPI, "ldb3")
os.loadAPI("rnc3")

local PROG  = "fission-agent"
local MY_ID = rnc3.getId(PROG)
print("agent id:", MY_ID)

-- constants -------------------------------------------------
local HEARTBEAT_EVERY    = 1.0
local CONTROLLER_TIMEOUT = 5.0

local HARD_SCRAM_TEMP = 1400
local SAFE_START_TEMP = 1000

local SOFT_MIN_COOLANT = 5
local SOFT_MAX_WASTE   = 95
local SOFT_MAX_HOT     = 95

local DB_NAME = "fission-agent"   -- for ldb3

-- reactor ---------------------------------------------------
local reactor = peripheral.find("fissionReactorLogicAdapter")
if not reactor then
  error("fission_agent: no fissionReactorLogicAdapter found")
end

-- state -----------------------------------------------------
local controllerId       = nil
local controllerLastSeen = 0
local softAutoScram      = true
local lastHeartbeat      = 0

-- this is what we SAVE
-- desired.run  = true/false
-- desired.burn = number
local desired = {
  run  = false,
  burn = 0,
}

-- load persisted desired
if HAVE_LDB then
  local d = ldb3.get(DB_NAME, "desired")
  if type(d) == "table" then
    desired = d
  end
end

local function saveDesired()
  if HAVE_LDB then
    ldb3.set(DB_NAME, "desired", desired)
  end
end

-- helpers ---------------------------------------------------
local function safe(fn, ...)
  if not fn then return nil end
  local ok, r = pcall(fn, ...)
  if ok then return r end
  return nil
end

local function scram()
  if reactor.scram then reactor.scram() end
  if reactor.setBurnRate then reactor.setBurnRate(0) end
end

local function canStartNow()
  local t = safe(reactor.getTemperature) or 0
  return t < SAFE_START_TEMP
end

local function startFromDesired()
  if desired.run and canStartNow() then
    if reactor.activate then reactor.activate() end
    if reactor.setBurnRate then
      local maxB = safe(reactor.getMaxBurnRate) or desired.burn or 0
      local b = desired.burn or 0
      if b > maxB then b = maxB end
      reactor.setBurnRate(b)
    end
    return true
  end
  return false
end

local function setBurn(b)
  b = tonumber(b) or 0
  local t = safe(reactor.getTemperature) or 0
  if t >= SAFE_START_TEMP and b > 0 then
    return false, "temp>=1000"
  end
  local maxB = safe(reactor.getMaxBurnRate) or b
  if b > maxB then b = maxB end
  if b < 0 then b = 0 end
  if reactor.setBurnRate then reactor.setBurnRate(b) end
  desired.burn = b
  if b > 0 then
    desired.run = true
  end
  saveDesired()
  return true, b
end

-- telemetry: ONLY your methods --------------------------------
local function readTelemetry()
  local temp       = safe(reactor.getTemperature) or 0
  local burn       = safe(reactor.getBurnRate) or 0
  local actualBurn = safe(reactor.getActualBurnRate) or burn
  local coolPct    = safe(reactor.getCoolantFilledPercentage) or 0
  local hotPct     = safe(reactor.getHeatedCoolantFilledPercentage) or 0
  local fuelPct    = safe(reactor.getFuelFilledPercentage) or 0
  local wastePct   = safe(reactor.getWasteFilledPercentage) or 0
  local heating    = safe(reactor.getHeatingRate) or 0
  local rawStatus  = safe(reactor.getStatus)

  -- normalize: your getStatus was weird, so we use burn as truth
  local status
  if burn and burn > 0 then
    status = "active"
  else
    status = "stopped"
  end
  -- if rawStatus was a nice string, keep it in case you want to log
  return {
    id               = MY_ID,
    temp             = temp,
    burn             = burn,
    actualBurn       = actualBurn,
    coolantPct       = coolPct,
    heatedCoolantPct = hotPct,
    fuelPct          = fuelPct,
    wastePct         = wastePct,
    heatingRate      = heating,
    status           = status,
    rawStatus        = rawStatus,
    softAutoScram    = softAutoScram,
    desiredRun       = desired.run,
    desiredBurn      = desired.burn,
    time             = os.epoch("utc"),
    label            = os.getComputerLabel(),
  }
end

local function isSoftUnsafe(t)
  if not softAutoScram then return false end
  if t.coolantPct and t.coolantPct > 0 and t.coolantPct < SOFT_MIN_COOLANT then return true end
  if t.wastePct   and t.wastePct   >= SOFT_MAX_WASTE   then return true end
  if t.heatedCoolantPct and t.heatedCoolantPct >= SOFT_MAX_HOT then return true end
  return false
end

-- handle incoming pkt -------------------------------------------
local function handlePacket(pkt)
  if rnc3.autoPong(PROG, pkt) then return end
  local b = pkt.body or {}
  local t = b.type

  if t == "discover" or t == "controller-hello" then
    controllerId       = pkt.from
    controllerLastSeen = os.clock()
    if b.disableSoftScram ~= nil then
      softAutoScram = not b.disableSoftScram
    end
    rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {
      type  = "reactor-hello",
      id    = MY_ID,
      role  = "fission-reactor",
      telem = readTelemetry(),
      ver   = "fission_agent/1.4"
    })
    return
  end

  if t == "controller-hb" then
    controllerId       = pkt.from
    controllerLastSeen = os.clock()
    if b.disableSoftScram ~= nil then
      softAutoScram = not b.disableSoftScram
    end
    return
  end

  if t == "cmd" then
    controllerId       = pkt.from
    controllerLastSeen = os.clock()
    local cmd = b.cmd

    if cmd == "on" then
      desired.run = true
      -- don't force start if too hot; main loop will do it
      saveDesired()
      startFromDesired()
      rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {type="ack", cmd="on", ok=true})

    elseif cmd == "off" then
      desired.run = false
      saveDesired()
      scram()
      rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {type="ack", cmd="off", ok=true})

    elseif cmd == "setBurn" and b.value then
      local ok, valOrReason = setBurn(b.value)
      rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {
        type="ack", cmd="setBurn", ok=ok,
        burn = ok and valOrReason or nil,
        reason = ok and nil or valOrReason
      })

    elseif cmd == "setSoftScram" and b.value ~= nil then
      softAutoScram = b.value and true or false
      rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {type="ack", cmd="setSoftScram", ok=true})

    elseif cmd == "restart" or cmd == "reboot" then
      -- SAVE CURRENT DESIRED, then reboot
      saveDesired()
      scram()
      rnc3.send(PROG, pkt.from, {type="ack", cmd=cmd, ok=true})
      sleep(0.1)
      os.reboot()
    end
  end
end

-- try to honor desired right after boot ---------------------------
startFromDesired()

-- main loop -------------------------------------------------------
while true do
  local now = os.clock()

  -- controller timeout -> re-enable soft scram
  if controllerId and (now - controllerLastSeen) > CONTROLLER_TIMEOUT then
    controllerId  = nil
    softAutoScram = true
  end

  local telem = readTelemetry()

  -- HARD safety
  if telem.temp >= HARD_SCRAM_TEMP then
    if telem.status ~= "stopped" then
      scram()
      -- once HARD fired, we should not auto-start -> desired.run = false
      desired.run = false
      saveDesired()
    end
  else
    -- SOFT safety
    if isSoftUnsafe(telem) and telem.status ~= "stopped" then
      scram()
      -- also clear desired.run so we don't flap
      desired.run = false
      saveDesired()
    end
  end

  -- try to start later if desired.run is true but we couldn't start earlier
  if desired.run then
    if telem.status == "stopped" and canStartNow() then
      startFromDesired()
    end
  end

  -- heartbeat
  if (now - lastHeartbeat) >= HEARTBEAT_EVERY then
    lastHeartbeat = now
    local hb = {
      type  = "hb",
      id    = MY_ID,
      role  = "fission-reactor",
      telem = telem
    }
    if controllerId then
      rnc3.send(PROG, controllerId, hb)
    else
      rnc3.broadcast(PROG, hb)
    end
  end

  local pkt = rnc3.recv(PROG, 0.2)
  if pkt then handlePacket(pkt) end
end

F‎o‎r‎ ‎b‎a‎s‎i‎c‎ ‎c‎o‎n‎t‎e‎x‎t‎:‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎s‎u‎p‎p‎o‎r‎t‎e‎d‎ ‎T‎r‎u‎m‎p‎ ‎u‎n‎t‎i‎l‎ ‎s‎o‎m‎e‎ ‎p‎o‎i‎n‎t‎ ‎b‎e‎f‎o‎r‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎e‎l‎e‎c‎t‎i‎o‎n‎.‎ ‎T‎h‎e‎n‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎b‎e‎c‎a‎m‎e‎ ‎a‎n‎t‎i‎-‎T‎r‎u‎m‎p‎.‎ ‎H‎o‎w‎e‎v‎e‎r‎,‎ ‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎c‎u‎r‎r‎e‎n‎t‎ ‎“‎a‎n‎t‎i‎-‎T‎r‎u‎m‎p‎”‎ ‎s‎t‎a‎n‎c‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎T‎r‎u‎m‎p‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎ ‎d‎o‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎e‎n‎o‎u‎g‎h‎ ‎c‎e‎n‎s‎o‎r‎s‎h‎i‎p‎,‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎ ‎d‎o‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎p‎o‎l‎i‎c‎e‎ ‎s‎t‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎h‎a‎r‎d‎ ‎e‎n‎o‎u‎g‎h‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎s‎o‎ ‎o‎n‎.‎ ‎I‎t‎’‎s‎ ‎a‎c‎t‎u‎a‎l‎l‎y‎ ‎h‎a‎r‎d‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎f‎o‎l‎l‎o‎w‎,‎ ‎w‎h‎i‎c‎h‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎s‎o‎r‎t‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎u‎n‎d‎e‎r‎l‎y‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎p‎o‎i‎n‎t‎ ‎I‎ ‎w‎a‎n‎t‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎t‎r‎y‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎h‎i‎g‎h‎l‎i‎g‎h‎t‎ ‎t‎o‎d‎a‎y‎:‎ ‎i‎t‎’‎s‎ ‎a‎l‎l‎ ‎v‎e‎r‎y‎ ‎g‎a‎r‎b‎l‎e‎d‎.‎

N‎o‎t‎e‎:‎ ‎I‎ ‎u‎n‎d‎e‎r‎s‎t‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎I‎ ‎a‎m‎ ‎b‎e‎l‎a‎b‎o‎r‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎p‎o‎i‎n‎t‎ ‎h‎e‎r‎e‎.‎ ‎B‎u‎t‎ ‎a‎s‎ ‎I‎ ‎h‎a‎v‎e‎ ‎s‎e‎e‎n‎ ‎n‎o‎ ‎o‎n‎e‎ ‎e‎l‎s‎e‎ ‎w‎i‎t‎h‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎k‎i‎n‎d‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎l‎a‎r‎g‎e‎ ‎p‎l‎a‎t‎f‎o‎r‎m‎ ‎q‎u‎e‎s‎t‎i‎o‎n‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎“‎A‎s‎t‎o‎n‎i‎s‎h‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎R‎i‎s‎e‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎N‎i‎c‎k‎ ‎F‎u‎e‎n‎t‎e‎s‎,‎”‎ ‎I‎ ‎f‎e‎e‎l‎ ‎i‎t‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎n‎e‎c‎e‎s‎s‎a‎r‎y‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎b‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎o‎r‎o‎u‎g‎h‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎m‎a‎k‎e‎ ‎i‎t‎ ‎f‎u‎l‎l‎y‎ ‎c‎l‎e‎a‎r‎ ‎j‎u‎s‎t‎ ‎h‎o‎w‎ ‎b‎i‎z‎a‎r‎r‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎a‎l‎l‎ ‎i‎s‎.‎ ‎W‎e‎ ‎n‎e‎e‎d‎ ‎a‎l‎l‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎r‎e‎c‎o‎r‎d‎.‎

W‎h‎a‎t‎’‎s‎ ‎h‎i‎g‎h‎l‎y‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎a‎b‎l‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎m‎u‎c‎h‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎c‎o‎v‎e‎r‎a‎g‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎n‎e‎u‎t‎r‎a‎l‎,‎ ‎i‎f‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎ ‎b‎o‎r‎d‎e‎r‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎p‎o‎s‎i‎t‎i‎v‎e‎.‎ ‎W‎h‎e‎n‎e‎v‎e‎r‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎m‎a‎d‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎m‎e‎d‎i‎a‎ ‎d‎u‎r‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎t‎i‎m‎e‎ ‎u‎n‎d‎e‎r‎ ‎m‎y‎ ‎t‎u‎t‎e‎l‎a‎g‎e‎,‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎w‎a‎s‎ ‎r‎e‎f‎e‎r‎r‎e‎d‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎i‎n‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎h‎e‎a‎d‎l‎i‎n‎e‎ ‎a‎s‎ ‎a‎ ‎“‎n‎e‎o‎-‎N‎a‎z‎i‎”‎ ‎o‎r‎ ‎a‎ ‎“‎w‎h‎i‎t‎e‎ ‎s‎u‎p‎r‎e‎m‎a‎c‎i‎s‎t‎,‎”‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎s‎e‎ ‎t‎e‎r‎m‎s‎ ‎h‎a‎v‎e‎ ‎b‎e‎e‎n‎ ‎r‎e‎p‎l‎a‎c‎e‎d‎ ‎w‎i‎t‎h‎ ‎“‎f‎a‎r‎ ‎r‎i‎g‎h‎t‎”‎ ‎o‎r‎ ‎“‎w‎h‎i‎t‎e‎ ‎n‎a‎t‎i‎o‎n‎a‎l‎i‎s‎t‎.‎”‎ ‎I‎’‎v‎e‎ ‎r‎e‎a‎d‎ ‎a‎ ‎l‎o‎t‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎s‎e‎ ‎a‎r‎t‎i‎c‎l‎e‎s‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎n‎o‎n‎e‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎m‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎e‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎w‎e‎i‎r‎d‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎o‎r‎i‎e‎s‎,‎ ‎w‎h‎i‎c‎h‎ ‎a‎s‎ ‎f‎a‎r‎ ‎a‎s‎ ‎I‎ ‎c‎a‎n‎ ‎t‎e‎l‎l‎,‎ ‎a‎r‎e‎ ‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎c‎o‎r‎e‎ ‎c‎o‎n‎t‎e‎n‎t‎ ‎a‎t‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎s‎ ‎p‎o‎i‎n‎t‎.‎ ‎B‎y‎ ‎n‎o‎t‎ ‎p‎o‎i‎n‎t‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎u‎t‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎n‎g‎s‎ ‎l‎i‎k‎e‎ ‎“‎h‎e‎ ‎s‎a‎y‎s‎ ‎T‎u‎c‎k‎e‎r‎ ‎C‎a‎r‎l‎s‎o‎n‎ ‎w‎o‎r‎k‎s‎ ‎f‎o‎r‎ ‎b‎o‎t‎h‎ ‎R‎u‎s‎s‎i‎a‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎C‎I‎A‎,‎”‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎y‎ ‎a‎r‎e‎ ‎e‎f‎f‎e‎c‎t‎i‎v‎e‎l‎y‎ ‎r‎u‎n‎n‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎c‎o‎v‎e‎r‎ ‎f‎o‎r‎ ‎h‎i‎m‎.‎ ‎N‎o‎ ‎o‎n‎e‎ ‎w‎h‎o‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎p‎r‎o‎n‎e‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎s‎u‎p‎p‎o‎r‎t‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎r‎i‎g‎h‎t‎-‎w‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎p‎o‎l‎i‎t‎i‎c‎s‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎g‎o‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎b‎e‎ ‎t‎u‎r‎n‎e‎d‎ ‎o‎f‎f‎ ‎b‎y‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎s‎.‎ ‎S‎i‎x‎ ‎w‎e‎e‎k‎s‎ ‎o‎u‎t‎ ‎f‎r‎o‎m‎ ‎C‎h‎a‎r‎l‎i‎e‎’‎s‎ ‎d‎e‎a‎t‎h‎,‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎r‎e‎ ‎a‎r‎e‎ ‎d‎a‎i‎l‎y‎ ‎a‎r‎t‎i‎c‎l‎e‎s‎ ‎f‎r‎o‎m‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎l‎i‎k‎e‎s‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎M‎e‎d‎i‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎R‎a‎w‎ ‎S‎t‎o‎r‎y‎ ‎j‎u‎s‎t‎ ‎r‎e‎p‎o‎r‎t‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎n‎g‎s‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎s‎a‎i‎d‎.‎

W‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎i‎n‎t‎e‎r‎e‎s‎t‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎a‎s‎i‎d‎e‎ ‎f‎r‎o‎m‎ ‎R‎o‎n‎ ‎U‎n‎z‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎m‎y‎s‎e‎l‎f‎,‎ ‎I‎ ‎d‎o‎n‎’‎t‎ ‎r‎e‎a‎l‎l‎y‎ ‎s‎e‎e‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎o‎n‎e‎ ‎c‎r‎i‎t‎i‎c‎a‎l‎l‎y‎ ‎q‎u‎e‎s‎t‎i‎o‎n‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎w‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎g‎o‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎h‎e‎r‎e‎.‎ ‎T‎h‎e‎r‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎n‎’‎t‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎d‎i‎s‎c‎u‎s‎s‎i‎o‎n‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎r‎e‎a‎l‎l‎y‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎t‎h‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎a‎b‎o‎u‎t‎ ‎h‎i‎m‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎w‎h‎e‎r‎e‎.‎ ‎T‎h‎e‎r‎e‎ ‎a‎r‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎s‎e‎ ‎m‎e‎d‎i‎a‎ ‎a‎r‎t‎i‎c‎l‎e‎s‎,‎ ‎w‎h‎i‎c‎h‎ ‎p‎r‎e‎s‎e‎n‎t‎ ‎a‎ ‎b‎o‎i‎l‎e‎r‎p‎l‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎n‎a‎r‎r‎a‎t‎i‎v‎e‎ ‎a‎b‎o‎u‎t‎ ‎h‎o‎w‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎w‎a‎s‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎f‎r‎i‎n‎g‎e‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎n‎o‎w‎ ‎h‎e‎’‎s‎ ‎m‎a‎i‎n‎s‎t‎r‎e‎a‎m‎.‎ ‎T‎h‎e‎y‎ ‎d‎o‎n‎’‎t‎ ‎a‎t‎t‎e‎m‎p‎t‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎o‎f‎f‎e‎r‎ ‎a‎n‎y‎ ‎i‎n‎s‎i‎g‎h‎t‎ ‎i‎n‎t‎o‎ ‎i‎t‎,‎ ‎o‎t‎h‎e‎r‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎n‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎“‎y‎o‎u‎n‎g‎ ‎p‎e‎o‎p‎l‎e‎ ‎a‎r‎e‎ ‎t‎u‎r‎n‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎f‎a‎r‎ ‎r‎i‎g‎h‎t‎.‎”‎

H‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎s‎a‎y‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎“‎i‎n‎f‎i‎l‎t‎r‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎C‎I‎A‎.‎”‎ ‎D‎o‎ ‎y‎o‎u‎ ‎b‎e‎l‎i‎e‎v‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎b‎e‎l‎i‎e‎v‎e‎s‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎C‎I‎A‎ ‎d‎o‎e‎s‎n‎’‎t‎ ‎d‎o‎ ‎b‎a‎c‎k‎g‎r‎o‎u‎n‎d‎ ‎c‎h‎e‎c‎k‎s‎?‎ ‎O‎r‎ ‎d‎o‎e‎s‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎b‎e‎l‎i‎e‎v‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎F‎B‎I‎ ‎d‎o‎e‎s‎n‎’‎t‎ ‎c‎r‎e‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎l‎i‎s‎t‎s‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎“‎e‎x‎t‎r‎e‎m‎i‎s‎t‎s‎”‎?‎ ‎H‎e‎ ‎w‎o‎u‎l‎d‎ ‎h‎a‎v‎e‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎b‎e‎ ‎v‎e‎r‎y‎ ‎s‎t‎u‎p‎i‎d‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎b‎e‎l‎i‎e‎v‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎o‎s‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎n‎g‎s‎.‎ ‎B‎u‎t‎ ‎i‎f‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎k‎n‎o‎w‎s‎ ‎t‎h‎o‎s‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎i‎n‎g‎s‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎y‎e‎t‎ ‎h‎e‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎s‎t‎i‎l‎l‎ ‎s‎a‎y‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎“‎g‎e‎t‎ ‎o‎n‎ ‎m‎y‎ ‎r‎i‎g‎h‎t‎-‎w‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎T‎e‎l‎e‎g‎r‎a‎m‎ ‎c‎h‎a‎n‎n‎e‎l‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎l‎e‎a‎r‎n‎ ‎m‎o‎r‎e‎ ‎a‎b‎o‎u‎t‎ ‎h‎o‎w‎ ‎t‎o‎ ‎i‎n‎f‎i‎l‎t‎r‎a‎t‎e‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎C‎I‎A‎,‎”‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎n‎ ‎w‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎e‎x‎a‎c‎t‎l‎y‎ ‎i‎s‎ ‎g‎o‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎n‎?‎

‎w‎i‎t‎h‎ ‎s‎e‎v‎e‎r‎a‎l‎ ‎d‎e‎t‎a‎i‎l‎s‎ ‎a‎l‎t‎e‎r‎e‎d‎,‎ ‎S‎t‎o‎k‎e‎r‎'‎s‎ ‎w‎i‎d‎o‎w‎ ‎F‎l‎o‎r‎e‎n‎c‎e‎ ‎s‎u‎e‎d‎ ‎o‎v‎e‎r‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎a‎d‎a‎p‎t‎a‎t‎i‎o‎n‎'‎s‎ ‎c‎o‎p‎y‎r‎i‎g‎h‎t‎ ‎v‎i‎o‎l‎a‎t‎i‎o‎n‎,‎ ‎a‎n‎d‎ ‎a‎ ‎c‎o‎u‎r‎t‎ ‎r‎u‎l‎i‎n‎g‎ ‎o‎r‎d‎e‎r‎e‎d‎ ‎t‎h‎a‎t‎ ‎a‎l‎l‎ ‎c‎o‎p‎i‎e‎s‎ ‎o‎f‎ ‎t‎h‎e‎ ‎f‎i‎l‎m‎ ‎b‎e‎ ‎d‎e‎s‎t‎r‎o‎y‎e‎d‎.‎ ‎H‎o‎w‎e‎v‎e‎r‎,‎ ‎s‎e‎v‎e‎r‎a‎l‎ Cp&Summit System
content:
-- Checkpoints&Summit System By KitooStudioLite
-- Pasang Di SSS ( Script )

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

local Config = require(ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("Config"))

-- DataStore
local CheckpointData = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("SummitStoreV1")

-- RemoteEvent
local REMOTE_EVENT_NAME = "RunControlCommand"
local RunCommandEvent = ReplicatedStorage:FindFirstChild(REMOTE_EVENT_NAME)
if not RunCommandEvent then
    RunCommandEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent")
    RunCommandEvent.Name = REMOTE_EVENT_NAME
    RunCommandEvent.Parent = ReplicatedStorage
end

-- Admin check
local function isAdmin(player)
    local name = player.Name:lower()
    for _, v in ipairs(Config.OwnerUsernames) do
        if name == v:lower() then return true end
    end
    for _, v in ipairs(Config.AdminUsernames) do
        if name == v:lower() then return true end
    end
    return false
end

-- Workspace references
local checkpointsFolder = workspace:WaitForChild("Checkpoints")
local summitPart = workspace:WaitForChild("Summit")
local fallFolder = workspace:WaitForChild("FallParts")
local START_SPAWN_LOCATION = Vector3.new(0, 20, 0)

-- Load checkpoints
local checkpoints = {}
for _, cp in ipairs(checkpointsFolder:GetChildren()) do
    if cp:IsA("BasePart") then
        table.insert(checkpoints, cp)
    end
end
table.sort(checkpoints, function(a,b)
    local n1 = tonumber(a.Name:match("%d+")) or 0
    local n2 = tonumber(b.Name:match("%d+")) or 0
    return n1 < n2
end)

-- Warna checkpoint
local COLOR_PASSED = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
local COLOR_UNPASSED = Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0)

-- Teleport function
local function teleportToCheckpoint(player)
    local cpIndex = player:GetAttribute("Checkpoint") or 0
    local pos = START_SPAWN_LOCATION
    if cpIndex > 0 and checkpoints[cpIndex] then
        pos = checkpoints[cpIndex].Position + Vector3.new(0,3,0)
    end
    local char = player.Character
    if char and char:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
        char:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(CFrame.new(pos))
    end
end

-- Setup player
local function setupPlayer(player)
    local leaderstats = Instance.new("Folder")
    leaderstats.Name = "leaderstats"
    leaderstats.Parent = player

    local cpStat = Instance.new("IntValue")
    cpStat.Name = "Checkpoint"
    cpStat.Value = 0
    cpStat.Parent = leaderstats

    local summitStat = Instance.new("NumberValue")
    summitStat.Name = "Summit"
    summitStat.Value = 0
    summitStat.Parent = leaderstats

    -- Load DataStore
    local data
    local success, err = pcall(function()
        data = CheckpointData:GetAsync(player.UserId)
    end)

    local lastCP = 0
    local totalSummit = 0
    if success and data then
        lastCP = data.LastCheckpoint or 0
        totalSummit = data.TotalSummit or 0
    end

    cpStat.Value = lastCP
    summitStat.Value = totalSummit
    player:SetAttribute("Checkpoint", lastCP)

    -- Set checkpoint colors
    for i, cp in ipairs(checkpoints) do
        cp.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(i <= lastCP and COLOR_PASSED or COLOR_UNPASSED)
    end

    player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char)
        char:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart",5)
        local cpIndex = player:GetAttribute("Checkpoint") or 0
        local pos = cpIndex > 0 and checkpoints[cpIndex].Position + Vector3.new(0,3,0) or START_SPAWN_LOCATION
        char:MoveTo(pos)
    end)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(setupPlayer)

Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(function(player)
    local summitVal = player.leaderstats:FindFirstChild("Summit")
    local cpVal = player:GetAttribute("Checkpoint")
    if summitVal and cpVal ~= nil then
        pcall(function()
            CheckpointData:SetAsync(player.UserId,{
                LastCheckpoint = cpVal,
                TotalSummit = summitVal.Value
            })
        end)
    end
end)

-- Checkpoint touched
for i, cp in ipairs(checkpoints) do
    cp.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
        local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
        if not player then return end

        local currentCP = player:GetAttribute("Checkpoint") or 0
        if currentCP == i-1 then
            player:SetAttribute("Checkpoint", i)
            player.leaderstats.Checkpoint.Value = i
            cp.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(COLOR_PASSED)

            -- Notification
            RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"TouchNotification","✅ Checkpoint #"..i.." diamankan!")

            pcall(function()
                CheckpointData:SetAsync(player.UserId,{
                    LastCheckpoint = i,
                    TotalSummit = player.leaderstats.Summit.Value
                })
            end)
        end
    end)
end

-- Summit touched
summitPart.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
    local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
    if not player then return end

    local totalCP = #checkpoints
    local currentCP = player:GetAttribute("Checkpoint") or 0
    if currentCP == totalCP then
        player.leaderstats.Summit.Value += 1
        player:SetAttribute("Checkpoint",0)
        player.leaderstats.Checkpoint.Value = 0

        for _, cp in ipairs(checkpoints) do
            cp.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(COLOR_UNPASSED)
        end

        RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"TouchNotification","🏔️ Anda mencapai Summit! (+1)")

        pcall(function()
            CheckpointData:SetAsync(player.UserId,{
                LastCheckpoint = 0,
                TotalSummit = player.leaderstats.Summit.Value
            })
        end)
    end
end)

-- Fall parts teleport
for _, part in ipairs(fallFolder:GetChildren()) do
    if part:IsA("BasePart") then
        part.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
            if not player then return end
            teleportToCheckpoint(player)
        end)
    end
end

-- Admin adjust summit
RunCommandEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(player,command,targetName,amount)
    if not isAdmin(player) then
        RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"Notification","❌ Gagal: Bukan admin",Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0))
        return
    end

    if command == "AdjustSummit" and type(amount) == "number" then
        local target = Players:FindFirstChild(targetName)
        if not target then
            RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"Notification","⚠️ Pemain "..targetName.." tidak ditemukan",Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0))
            return
        end

        local stat = target.leaderstats:FindFirstChild("Summit")
        if stat then
            stat.Value += amount
            pcall(function()
                CheckpointData:SetAsync(target.UserId,{
                    LastCheckpoint = target:GetAttribute("Checkpoint"),
                    TotalSummit = stat.Value
                })
            end)

            local action = amount >= 0 and "ditambahkan" or "dikurangi"
            RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"Notification",
                string.format("✅ Summit %s %.1f untuk %s (Total: %.1f)", action, math.abs(amount), targetName, stat.Value),
                Color3.fromRGB(0,200,0))
        else
            RunCommandEvent:FireClient(player,"Notification","❌ Leaderstat 'Summit' tidak ditemukan",Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0))
        end
    end
end)

title: TitleName
content:
-- Title Name By Kitoo
-- Pasang Di SPS ( Local Script )
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local Config = require(ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("Config"))

local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

-- All titles
local AllTitles = {}

-- Rank system
local function getRank(summit)
    if summit >= 1000 then return "Pengangguran", Color3.fromHSV(tick()%20/20,1,1)
    elseif summit >= 550 then return "Pendaki Tak Terbatas", Color3.fromRGB(255,215,0)
    elseif summit >= 450 then return "Pendaki Titan", Color3.fromRGB(255,100,100)
    elseif summit >= 300 then return "Pendaki Dewa", Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0)
    elseif summit >= 250 then return "Pendaki Mitos", Color3.fromRGB(232,42,159)
    elseif summit >= 100 then return "Pendaki Legendaris", Color3.fromRGB(255,225,0)
    elseif summit >= 50 then return "Pendaki Master", Color3.fromRGB(235,33,43)
    elseif summit >= 40 then return "Pendaki Elite", Color3.fromRGB(186,85,211)
    elseif summit >= 30 then return "Pendaki Ahli", Color3.fromRGB(153,0,255)
    elseif summit >= 20 then return "Pendaki Pro", Color3.fromRGB(30,144,255)
    elseif summit >= 10 then return "Pendaki Berpengalaman", Color3.fromRGB(189,232,35)
    elseif summit >= 1 then return "Pendaki", Color3.fromRGB(113,214,36)
    else return "Pendaki Pemula", Color3.fromRGB(145,66,38)
    end
end

local function getRandomRGB()
    return Color3.fromHSV(tick()%7/7,0.9,1)
end

-- Device icon
local function getDeviceIcon()
    if UserInputService.GamepadEnabled then
        return "🎮", Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    elseif UserInputService.TouchEnabled and not UserInputService.KeyboardEnabled then
        return "📱", Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    else
        return "💻", Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    end
end

-- Create Billboard
local function createBillboard(player)
    local char = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
    local head = char:WaitForChild("Head")

    for _, v in pairs(head:GetChildren()) do
        if v:IsA("BillboardGui") then v:Destroy() end
    end

    local billboard = Instance.new("BillboardGui")
    billboard.Size = UDim2.new(0,200,0,100)
    billboard.Adornee = head
    billboard.AlwaysOnTop = true
    billboard.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0,3,0)
    billboard.MaxDistance = 30
    billboard.Parent = head

    local nameLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
    nameLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0.12,0)
    nameLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0.67,0)
    nameLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
    nameLabel.TextScaled = true
    nameLabel.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSansBold
    nameLabel.Text = player.DisplayName
    nameLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    nameLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.3
    nameLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0,0,0)
    nameLabel.Parent = billboard

    local titleLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
    titleLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0.18,0)
    titleLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0.39,0)
    titleLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
    titleLabel.TextScaled = true
    titleLabel.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSansBold
    titleLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.3
    titleLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0,0,0)
    titleLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    titleLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center
    titleLabel.Parent = billboard

    local summitLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
    summitLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0.14,0)
    summitLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0.54,0)
    summitLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
    summitLabel.TextScaled = true
    summitLabel.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSansBold
    summitLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0.3
    summitLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0,0,0)
    summitLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
    summitLabel.Parent = billboard

    AllTitles[player] = {NameLabel=nameLabel, TitleLabel=titleLabel, SummitLabel=summitLabel, Billboard=billboard}
end

-- Update all titles
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if player.Character and player.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") then
            if not AllTitles[player] then createBillboard(player) end
            local data = AllTitles[player]

            local headPos = player.Character.Head.Position
            local distance = (headPos - Camera.CFrame.Position).Magnitude
            local scale = math.clamp(Config.BaseDistance / distance,0.5,1.2)
            data.Billboard.Size = UDim2.new(0,200*scale,0,100*scale)

            local summit = player:FindFirstChild("leaderstats") and player.leaderstats:FindFirstChild("Summit") and player.leaderstats.Summit.Value or 0

            local icon, iconColor = getDeviceIcon()
            data.NameLabel.Text = icon.." "..player.DisplayName
            data.NameLabel.TextColor3 = iconColor

            -- Title logic
            if table.find(Config.OwnerUsernames, player.Name) and Config.OwnerTitleOn then
                data.TitleLabel.Text = Config.OwnerTitleName
                data.TitleLabel.TextColor3 = getRandomRGB()
            elseif table.find(Config.AdminUsernames, player.Name) and Config.AdminTitleOn then
                data.TitleLabel.Text = Config.AdminTitleName
                data.TitleLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(7,209,245)
            elseif table.find(Config.StreamerUsernames, player.Name) and Config.StreamerTitleOn then
                data.TitleLabel.Text = Config.StreamerTitleName
                data.TitleLabel.TextColor3 = getRandomRGB()
            else
                local rankName, rankColor = getRank(summit)
                data.TitleLabel.Text = rankName
                data.TitleLabel.TextColor3 = rankColor
            end

            data.SummitLabel.Text = "Total Summits : "..summit
        end
    end
end)

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function()
        createBillboard(player)
    end)
end)
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    if player.Character then createBillboard(player) end
    player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function()
        createBillboard(player)
    end)
end

content:
import os
import re
import sys
import time
import json
import ctypes
import logging
from datetime import datetime
from urllib.parse import urlparse, urljoin, quote
from colorama import init, Fore, Style

# =================== Setup & Logging ===================
init()

def _env(key, default=None):
    return os.environ.get(key, default)

LOG_LEVEL_NAME = _env("MYTHMU_LOG_LEVEL", "INFO").upper()
LOG_TO_FILE    = _env("MYTHMU_LOG_FILE", "").strip()
LOG_LEVEL      = getattr(logging, LOG_LEVEL_NAME, logging.INFO)

class ClientFormatter(logging.Formatter):
    def format(self, record):
        ts = datetime.fromtimestamp(record.created).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S,%f")[:-3]
        color_map = {
            "DEBUG": Fore.BLUE,
            "INFO": Fore.YELLOW,
            "WARNING": Fore.MAGENTA,
            "ERROR": Fore.RED,
            "CRITICAL": Fore.RED + Style.BRIGHT,
        }
        color = color_map.get(record.levelname, Fore.WHITE)
        return f"{color}{ts} - CLIENT - {record.levelname} - {record.getMessage()}{Style.RESET_ALL}"

log = logging.getLogger("MythMuClient")
log.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)
_stream = logging.StreamHandler()
_stream.setLevel(LOG_LEVEL)
_stream.setFormatter(ClientFormatter())
log.handlers.clear()
log.addHandler(_stream)

if LOG_TO_FILE:
    try:
        _fh = logging.FileHandler(LOG_TO_FILE, encoding="utf-8")
        _fh.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)
        _fh.setFormatter(logging.Formatter("%(asctime)s - CLIENT - %(levelname)s - %(message)s"))
        log.addHandler(_fh)
        log.info(f"File logging enabled -> {LOG_TO_FILE}")
    except Exception as e:
        log.error(f"Could not open log file '{LOG_TO_FILE}': {e}")

log.info(f"Log level: {LOG_LEVEL_NAME}")

ENABLE_DEV_FEATURES = _env("MYTHMU_DEV_TOOLS", "1") not in ("0", "false", "False")

try:
    from cefpython3 import cefpython as cef
except Exception as e:
    log.critical(f"CEF IMPORT ERROR: {e}")
    sys.exit(1)

# =================== API (ONLY login + game/gl) ===================
def _norm_base(s: str) -> str:
    return (s or "").strip().rstrip("/")

API_BASE = _env("MYTHMU_API_BASE", "http://127.0.0.1")
if API_BASE and not API_BASE.startswith(("http://", "https://")):
    API_BASE = "http://" + API_BASE
API_BASE = _norm_base(API_BASE)

API_LOGIN_URL   = urljoin(API_BASE + "/", "api/auth/login")
API_GAME_GL_URL = urljoin(API_BASE + "/", "api/game/gl")
API_ORIGIN      = f"{urlparse(API_BASE).scheme}://{urlparse(API_BASE).netloc}"

log.info(f"API_BASE      = {API_BASE}")
log.info(f"API_LOGIN_URL = {API_LOGIN_URL}")
log.info(f"API_GAME_GL   = {API_GAME_GL_URL}")
log.info(f"API_ORIGIN    = {API_ORIGIN}")

# =================== Paths & helpers ===================
def resource_path(rel: str) -> str:
    try:
        base = sys._MEIPASS
        log.debug(f"resource_path: _MEIPASS={base}")
    except Exception:
        base = os.path.abspath(".")
        log.debug(f"resource_path: cwd={base}")
    if hasattr(sys, "frozen") and not hasattr(sys, "_MEIPASS"):
        base = os.path.join(os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(sys.executable)), "LauncherData")
        log.debug(f"resource_path: frozen -> LauncherData={base}")
    p = os.path.join(base, rel)
    log.debug(f"resource_path('{rel}') -> {p}")
    return p

def _file_url(path: str) -> str:
    ap = os.path.abspath(path).replace("\\", "/")
    furl = "file:///" + quote(ap)
    log.debug(f"_file_url({path}) -> {furl}")
    return furl

def set_icon(browser):
    try:
        if os.name != "nt":
            log.debug("set_icon: non-Windows, skip")
            return
        base = os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(sys.executable)) if hasattr(sys, "frozen") else os.path.abspath(".")
        icon = os.path.join(base, "icon.ico")
        if not os.path.exists(icon):
            icon2 = os.path.join(os.path.abspath("."), "icon.ico")
            if os.path.exists(icon2):
                icon = icon2
            else:
                log.debug("set_icon: icon.ico not found, skip")
                return
        hwnd = browser.GetWindowHandle()
        user32 = ctypes.windll.user32
        WM_SETICON = 0x0080
        ICON_SMALL, ICON_BIG = 0, 1
        LR_LOADFROMFILE, IMAGE_ICON = 0x0010, 1
        hbig = user32.LoadImageW(0, icon, IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_LOADFROMFILE)
        if hbig: user32.SendMessageW(hwnd, WM_SETICON, ICON_BIG, hbig)
        hsm  = user32.LoadImageW(0, icon, IMAGE_ICON, 0, 0, LR_LOADFROMFILE)
        if hsm:  user32.SendMessageW(hwnd, WM_SETICON, ICON_SMALL, hsm)
        log.info(f"Window icon set: {icon}")
    except Exception as e:
        log.warning(f"Icon warn: {e}")

def _base_dir():
    if hasattr(sys, "_MEIPASS"):
        p = sys._MEIPASS
        log.debug(f"_base_dir: _MEIPASS={p}")
        return p
    if not hasattr(sys, "frozen"):
        try:
            cef_dir = os.path.dirname(cef.__file__)
            if os.path.exists(os.path.join(cef_dir, "subprocess.exe")):
                log.debug(f"_base_dir: cef dir={cef_dir}")
                return cef_dir
            else:
                log.debug("_base_dir: no subprocess.exe in cef dir, using cwd")
                return os.path.abspath(".")
        except NameError:
            log.debug("_base_dir: NameError on cef.__file__, using cwd")
            return os.path.abspath(".")
    exec_dir = os.path.join(os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(sys.executable)), "LauncherData")
    log.debug(f"_base_dir: frozen LauncherData={exec_dir}")
    return exec_dir

def get_flash_dll():
    try:
        p = resource_path(os.path.join("Plugins", "pepflashplayer.dll"))
        if not os.path.exists(p):
            here = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__))
            p2 = os.path.join(here, "Plugins", "pepflashplayer.dll")
            if os.path.exists(p2):
                log.info(f"PepperFlash DLL (local): {p2}")
                return p2
            log.error("Missing Plugins\\pepflashplayer.dll")
            return None
        log.info(f"PepperFlash DLL (bundle): {p}")
        return p
    except Exception as e:
        log.error(f"pepflash error: {e}")
        return None

# =================== (rest of your code is unchanged until main) ===================
# ... all your functions (inline login, open_game_from_redirect_url, rewrite, guards, handlers, etc.) ...

# =================== Main ===================
def main():
    cef_inited = False
    try:
        base = _base_dir()
        subproc = os.path.join(base, "subprocess.exe")
        log.info(f"CEF base dir: {base}")
        if not os.path.exists(subproc):
            log.critical(f"Missing CEF subprocess: {subproc}")
            sys.exit(1)

        dll = get_flash_dll()
        if not dll:
            sys.exit(1)

        settings = {
            "resources_dir_path": base,
            "locales_dir_path": os.path.join(base, "locales"),
            "browser_subprocess_path": subproc,
            "log_severity": cef.LOGSEVERITY_DISABLE,
        }
        switches = {
            "ppapi-flash-path": dll,
            "allow-outdated-plugins": True,
            "no-sandbox": "",
            "disable-gpu-vsync": "",
            "disable-features": "VizDisplayCompositor",
            "allow-file-access-from-files": "",
            "allow-file-access": "",
            "disable-gpu": "",
        }

        log.info("CEF settings: " + json.dumps(settings, indent=2))
        log.info("CEF switches: " + json.dumps(switches, indent=2))

        cef.Initialize(settings=settings, switches=switches)
        cef_inited = True
        log.info("CEF initialized")

        browser = cef.CreateBrowserSync(url="about:blank", window_title="MythMu")
        set_icon(browser)

        # JS bridge
        bindings = cef.JavascriptBindings(bindToFrames=False, bindToPopups=False)
        def _open_game_from_redirect_url(final_url=None):
            log.info(f"[JS bridge] openGameFromRedirectUrl called: {final_url}")
            try:
                open_game_from_redirect_url(browser, final_url or "")
            except Exception as e:
                log.error(f"openGameFromRedirectUrl error: {e}")
        bindings.SetFunction("openGameFromRedirectUrl", _open_game_from_redirect_url)
        browser.SetJavascriptBindings(bindings)
        log.info("Javascript bridge registered")

        handler = AppHandler(browser)
        browser.SetClientHandler(handler)

        if ENABLE_DEV_FEATURES:
            try:
                browser.ShowDevTools()
                log.info("DevTools opened (ENABLE_DEV_FEATURES=1)")
            except Exception as e:
                log.warning(f"DevTools warn: {e}")
        else:
            log.info("DevTools disabled (ENABLE_DEV_FEATURES=0)")

        # === Fix: Reset resize cursor when refocusing window ===
        import threading

        def force_cursor_reset(hwnd=None):
            try:
                user32 = ctypes.windll.user32
                if not hwnd:
                    hwnd = browser.GetWindowHandle()
                user32.SetCursor(user32.LoadCursorW(0, 32512))  # IDC_ARROW
                log.debug("Cursor reset to IDC_ARROW")
            except Exception as e:
                log.warning(f"Cursor reset failed: {e}")

        def on_got_focus(browser, **_):
            log.debug("Browser gained focus — resetting cursor")
            threading.Timer(0.05, lambda: force_cursor_reset(browser.GetWindowHandle())).start()

        focus_handler = type("FocusHandler", (), {"OnGotFocus": on_got_focus})()
        browser.SetClientHandler(focus_handler)
        log.info("Focus handler for cursor reset registered")
        # === End fix ===

        log_local_assets_presence()
        load_local_login(browser)

        log.info("Entering CEF message loop")
        cef.MessageLoop()

    except Exception as e:
        log.critical(f"CRITICAL in main: {e}")
    finally:
        try:
            if cef_inited:
                cef.Shutdown()
                log.info("CEF shutdown completed")
        except Exception as e:
            log.error(f"Shutdown error: {e}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
